availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Caldwell County, Kentucky, farmer. Caldwell County, Kentucky, native. Son of James G. Glenn. Married to Sarah Glenn. Father of Nellie Glenn. Laborer in Caldwell County, Kentucky, in 1850. Farmer in Caldwell County in 1863.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Caldwell County, District 1, p. 303A.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Lyon County, District, 1 p. 7B.
Tenth Manuscript Census of the United States (1880), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Lyon County, Eddyville, 142, p. 29B.
Consolidated Lists of Civil War Draft Registration Records Records of the Provost Marshal General's Bureau (Civil War) NARA RG 110, Caldwell County, KY, June & July 1863, p. 15.
Find A Grave, "Henry V. Glenn (1834-1893)," Memorial #179604440, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/179604440 (accessed May 18, 2021).
